name: Suck Ops
description:
Suck Ops is a game where you are a floating Roomba-like vacuum, tasked with sucking up all the trash floating down the river. 

The small trash is easy scoop up for the vacuum but the big bags of trash won't get sucked up! They need to be pushed over to the assistant big vacuums to the sides of the river! You are allowed no more than 10 pieces of trash down the river, that is unless you can stop the trash bags...

controls:

WASD to move (run over the trash, push trash bags to the big vacuums. that's all the controls you need)

Controller is compatible! (and recommended!)
